justification: Vendor 2 describes automation of business processes—'asset commissioning, compliance verification, maintenance scheduling, and feedback loops'—using a 'workflow engine' that integrates with digital twin data, directly addressing process execution. Interfaces (BPMN, REST, SOAP) and security standards are specified. However, there is no explicit, detailed example showing end-to-end execution or repeatability, and outcomes are listed but not deeply evidenced. This limits full confidence.
ability: The ability to execute a sequence of actions as a process flow to achieve specific business outcomes
